languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт печально качает головой.{/n} "Увы, мой кузен впал в немилость архонта. Но даже так... не думаю, что Маражай раскрыл бы мне истину. По крайне мере до того, как его темная душа напитается моими страданиями".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт печально качает головой.{/n} "Увы, мой кузен впал в немилость архонта. Но даже так... не думаю, что Маражай раскрыл бы мне истину. По крайне мере до того, как его темная душа напитается моими страданиями".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт печально качает головой.{/n} "Увы, мой кузен впал в немилость архонта. Но даже так... не думаю, что Маражай раскрыл бы мне истину. По крайне мере до того, как его темная душа напитается моими страданиями".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“很遗憾，我的表亲已经失去了执政官的青睐，但即便沦落至此……玛拉斋恐怕也不会告诉我真相。至少，在他阴暗的灵魂彻底体会到我的痛苦之前，他是不会透露的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“很遗憾，我的表亲已经失去了执政官的青睐，但即便沦落至此……玛拉斋恐怕也不会告诉我真相。至少，在他阴暗的灵魂彻底体会到我的痛苦之前，他是不会透露的。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Por desgracia, mi primo ya no cuenta con el favor del Arconte. Aun así... dudo que Marazhai estuviera dispuesto a revelar la verdad. No hasta que su alma oscura estuviera saciada con mi sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Por desgracia, mi primo ya no cuenta con el favor del Arconte. Aun así... dudo que Marazhai estuviera dispuesto a revelar la verdad. No hasta que su alma oscura estuviera saciada con mi sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「残念ながら、我の同族はアーコンの寵愛を失った。それでも…マラズハイが真実を明かすとは思えない。少なくとも、あいつの暗い魂が我の苦しみで満たされるまでは」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「残念ながら、我の同族はアーコンの寵愛を失った。それでも…マラズハイが真実を明かすとは思えない。少なくとも、あいつの暗い魂が我の苦しみで満たされるまでは」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Leider hat mein Vetter die Gunst des Archonten verloren. Dennoch ... Ich bezweifle, dass Marazhai die Wahrheit offenbaren würde. Zumindest nicht, bevor seine dunkle Seele in mein Leid getaucht wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Leider hat mein Vetter die Gunst des Archonten verloren. Dennoch ... Ich bezweifle, dass Marazhai die Wahrheit offenbaren würde. Zumindest nicht, bevor seine dunkle Seele in mein Leid getaucht wird."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Hélas, mon cousin a perdu les bonnes grâces de l'archonte. Mais même si ce n'était pas le cas... je ne pense pas que Marazhai m'aurait révélé la vérité. Du moins, pas avant que son âme noire ne soit gorgée de ma souffrance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Hélas, mon cousin a perdu les bonnes grâces de l'archonte. Mais même si ce n'était pas le cas... je ne pense pas que Marazhai m'aurait révélé la vérité. Du moins, pas avant que son âme noire ne soit gorgée de ma souffrance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Soydaşım, ne yazık ki Arkon'un gözünden düştü. Ancak yine de... Marazhai'ın hakikati açıklığa kavuşturacağından kuşkuluyum. En azından o karanlık ruhu acılarımı tüketmediği müddetçe pek imkânı yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Alas, my cousin fell out of favour with the Archon. But even so... I doubt Marazhai would reveal the truth. At least not before his dark soul was suffused with my suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Kuzenim, ne yazık ki Arkon'un gözünden düştü. Ancak yine de... Marazhai'ın hakikati açıklığa kavuşturacağından kuşkuluyum. En azından o karanlık ruhu acılarımla kaplanmadığı müddetçe pek imkânı yok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
